name: Besotted
description:
Besotted Adj. - To be strongly infatuated, as if drunk or possessed.

Besotted is a game about dancing away the demons that plague our character both mentally and physically.

"You can see them too, can't you? These creatures... Little monsters born from Hell Fire: here on earth to do terrible things. It will be okay though! I know the special dance moves that will help keep the baddies at bay! I am broadcasting to you live from my secret base at the community center 24 hours a day to teach you the dances moves that the devil doesn't want you to know!!" -- Maxwell Gutensane (Host of Public Access Show Besotted)

Fight away the demons, or go insane trying...
